concept.title: Diagnosis for Platen Conditions
concept.shortdesc: The condition of the platen post-cleaning helps to determine whether the platen needs to be replaced, refinished, or sanded.

strow.stentry: Rubber is hardened. Rubber has micro-cracks.
The platen roller needs to be refinished.
Severe indentation markings from type slugs. Extensive cracking throughout the roller.
The platen roller needs to be replaced.
Minimal indents or cracks. Feels glazed over or mildly hardened.
The platen roller needs to be sanded.
No cracks, indents, or hardened spots. Still feels rubbery to the touch.
